description.raw:
add ROS plugin, teleop node, launchfile and world file for the camera.

you need to run the `teleop_pose_keyboard` script with rosrun for it to get your key inputs, which is a bit annoying. right now the only thing that works is 'i' and 'k' to go up and down.

I am blocked on getting the pan/tilt to work because:

JointController doesn't take multi-axis inputs

and adding a hack-around solution with a fake link and 2 hinge joints caused a ton of crazy physics instability that was very frustrating to deal with.

So I am committing this in its current state. I can pick it up again tomorrow or if someone wants to work on integrating it with a model they could also look into enabling the pan/tilt features. let me know if you have any questions.

I am blocked on getting the pan/tilt to work because:

and adding a hack-around solution with a fake link and 2 hinge joints caused a ton of crazy physics instability that was very frustrating to deal with.

So I am committing this in its current state. I can pick it up again tomorrow or if someone wants to work on integrating it with a model they could also look into enabling the pan/tilt features. let me know if you have any questions.
